firm_information.name: Coldwell Banker Mary Ann Green Realty

house_listing.house_description: Take A Closer Look!!!! This 3 bedroom 2 bath home, with an incredible view of the hill country sunsets and plenty of wildflowers in the spring, has a spacious living area, formal dining room, kitchen w/center island, breakfast bar, fireplace, vaulted ceilings and more. The bedrooms have great walk-in closet space and the master bath has separate shower, double vanity, and garden tub. This unrestricted 8 acre tract, convenient to Bastrop, Austin and San Marcos is an incredible value at a comfortable price!!!!
